meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of leather in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The old book had a leathery cover that felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The worn-out sofa had a leathery feel to it, making it comfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent3: The leathery wallet looked like it had been on many adventures in its lifetime.
meanings.sent4: Her leathery hands told the story of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The leathery texture of the fruit made it seem unripe and unappetizing.

meanings.sent1: The chef used a leathery apron to protect his clothes from stains.
meanings.sent2: The leathery boots were perfect for hiking in rough terrain.
meanings.sent3: The leathery gloves made him feel like a superhero ready for any challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her leathery resolve helped her overcome all obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The leathery material of the bag ensured it would last for years without tearing.
